item.title: Metasploit
item.author: Author
item.description: Today, we will look at Metasploit; a widely used pen testing framework. Metasploit is a massive product and today we will focus on: What is Metasploit? What is msfconsole? What is Metasploitable2? Using Nmap in msfconsole Running an exploit using Metasploit Resources Presentation Slides Tip In the examples, I run exploits against Metasploitable 2 (a deliberately vulnerable VM). You can download it here. What is Metasploit? Metasploit is the worldâ€™s most used penetration testing framework made by Rapid7.
